data.lyric:
[ti:Helium]
[ar:David Guetta/Afrojack/Sia]
[al:Helium]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Helium - David Guetta (大卫.格塔)/Afrojack/Sia (希雅)
[00:00.70]Written by：Chris Braide/Sia
[00:01.41]I'm trying but I keep falling down
[00:06.17]
[00:08.34]I cry out but nothing comes now
[00:12.46]
[00:15.18]I'm giving my all and I know peace will come
[00:19.91]
[00:22.40]I never wanted to need someone
[00:25.86]
[00:27.50]Yeah I wanted to play tough
[00:29.49]Thought I could do all just on my own
[00:32.49]
[00:34.67]But even superwoman
[00:36.33]Sometimes needed superman's soul
[00:40.31]
[00:41.35]Help me out of this hell
[00:43.47]Your love lifts me up like helium
[00:50.41]Your love lifts me up when I'm down down down
[00:57.33]When I've hit the ground
[00:59.09]You're all I need
[01:02.38]
[01:04.41]'Cause your love lifts me up like helium
[01:10.97]
[01:25.36]And if you let go I'll float towards the sun
[01:30.07]
[01:32.40]I'm stronger 'cause you fill me up
[01:35.71]
[01:39.05]But when the fear comes and I drift towards the ground
[01:44.02]
[01:46.23]I am lucky that you're around
[01:49.62]
[01:51.69]Yeah I wanted to play tough
[01:53.85]Thought I could do all just on my own
[01:56.54]
[01:58.70]But even superwoman
[02:00.39]Sometimes needed superman's soul
[02:04.41]
[02:05.54]Help me out of this hell
[02:07.56]Your love lifts me up like helium
[02:14.04]
[02:14.62]Your love lifts me up when I'm down down down
[02:21.32]When I've hit the ground
[02:23.07]You're all I need
[02:26.51]
[02:28.25]'Cause your love lifts me up like helium
[02:34.84]
[02:46.33]Lifts me up like helium
[02:48.90]You lift me up and I am found
[02:51.85]
[02:52.49]You lift me up before I hit the ground
[02:56.13]You lift me up when I'm down down down
[02:58.90]
[02:59.55]You lift me up before I hit the ground
[03:03.11]You lift me up when I'm down down down
[03:05.70]
[03:06.30]You lift me up before I hit the ground
[03:10.11]
[03:10.67]Your love lifts me up like helium
[03:17.02]
[03:17.70]Your love lifts me up when I'm down down down
[03:24.42]When I've hit the ground
[03:25.66]
[03:26.26]You're all I need
[03:29.39]
[03:31.52]'Cause your love lifts me up like helium
[03:37.96]
[03:38.66]Your love lifts me up like helium
data.trans:
[ti:Helium]
[ar:David Guetta/Afrojack/Sia]
[al:Helium]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:00.70]//
[00:01.41]我竭力全力 却不断跌落
[00:06.17]
[00:08.34]我失声痛哭 却无人问津
[00:12.46]
[00:15.18]我倾尽所有 我知道宁静终会到来
[00:19.91]
[00:22.40]不曾需要过任何人
[00:25.86]
[00:27.50]我想要孤身一人砥砺前行
[00:29.49]凭一己之力应对一切
[00:32.49]
[00:34.67]但即使是女超人
[00:36.33]有时也需要超强的灵魂
[00:40.31]
[00:41.35]帮助我逃出地狱
[00:43.47]你的爱如氦气将我缓缓托起
[00:50.41]在我失魂落魄的时候 你的爱给了我振作起来的勇气
[00:57.33]当我跌入低谷时
[00:59.09]我唯一需要的就是你
[01:02.38]
[01:04.41]因为你的爱像氦气将我缓缓托起
[01:10.97]
[01:25.36]若你选择放手 我将向着太阳飞去
[01:30.07]
[01:32.40]我羽翼渐丰 是你让我逐渐成长
[01:35.71]
[01:39.05]但当恐惧爬上心头 我渐渐滑向深渊
[01:44.02]
[01:46.23]我多么庆幸有你在身旁
[01:49.62]
[01:51.69]我想要孤身一人砥砺前行
[01:53.85]凭一己之力应对一切
[01:56.54]
[01:58.70]但即使是女超人
[02:00.39]有时也需要超强的灵魂
[02:04.41]
[02:05.54]帮助我逃出地狱
[02:07.56]你的爱如氦气将我缓缓托起
[02:14.04]
[02:14.62]在我失魂落魄的时候 你的爱给了我振作起来的勇气
[02:21.32]当我跌入低谷
[02:23.07]我唯一需要的就是你
[02:26.51]
[02:28.25]你的爱如氦气将我缓缓托起
[02:34.84]
[02:46.33]如氦气将我高举
[02:48.90]你让我振作起来 让我重拾希望
[02:51.85]
[02:52.49]在我跌入谷底之前 你让我振作起来
[02:56.13]在我失魂落魄的时候 你的爱给了我振作起来的勇气
[02:58.90]
[02:59.55]在我跌入谷底之前 你让我振作起来
[03:03.11]在我失魂落魄的时候 你的爱给了我振作起来的勇气
[03:05.70]
[03:06.30]在我跌入谷底之前 你让我振作起来
[03:10.11]
[03:10.67]你的爱如氦气将我缓缓托起
[03:17.02]
[03:17.70]在我失魂落魄的时候 你的爱给了我振作起来的勇气
[03:24.42]当我跌入低谷时
[03:25.66]
[03:26.26]我唯一需要的就是你
[03:29.39]
[03:31.52]你的爱如氦气将我缓缓托起
[03:37.96]
[03:38.66]你的爱如氦气让我振作起来
